card.name: Aamumeren Isä
card.text: Unique. Maia. Animal. Whale. 1 strikes. May be played keyed to any Coastal Sea region [c] in the Northern Waste. Make a roll (modified by -2 if the company is overt) before strikes are assigned: 8-12 attack is detainment, 5-7 attack proceeds normally, 4 or less attack proceeds normally, but if all strikes are successful the company must return to its site of origin. As a long-event, each company traveling in the Northern Waste with a Coastal Sea region in their site path must return to its site of origin.

card.name: Aerfaroth
card.text: Unique. Playable at Pieni Satama if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Men (+1), Elves with a home site in the Northern Waste (+1), Dwarves (-1). tap: cancel an attack keyed to East Bay of Forochel or West Bay of Forochel by type or name.

card.name: Agog
card.text: Unique. Ice-orc. Leader. +1 prowess against Elves. +2 EI against Ice-orcs. +2 EI against the Ice-orcs and Orcs of the Bleak Mountains factions. +2 prowess/body when in the Northern Waste, +1 prowess when you have any manifestation of the The Witch-king in play.No More Nonsense may be duplicated on Agog.

card.name: Aiwendil
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Radagast. Playable on a hero company moving in Wilderland or the Northern Waste, if you have not revealed an avatar. Characters in the company may play any factions and allies as if you were Radagast, and you may play spells on the company as if on Radagast (except Sacrifice of Form; no CC required). During the movement/hazard phase, if you move through at least 2 Wilderness [w ,w], you may bring 1 resource from your sideboard to your play deck or 3 to your discard pile. Discard this card if the company does not move through a Wilderness region, if you have 10 P or more, or you play a non-hazard manifestation of an avatar,

attr.value: (1st) Drake — 1 strike with 10 prowess; (2nd)* Drake — 2 strikes with 11 prowess
*need only be faced if the company intends to play a second item the same turn (which may be played at a tapped site).
(1st) Drake — 1 strike with 10 prowess (2nd)* Drake — 2 strikes with 11 prowess
*need only be faced if the company intends to play a second item the same turn (which may be played at a tapped site).

card.name: Anglachel
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Playable at Tol Morwen. Warrior only: +1 prowess to a maximum of 10. After every strike bearer faces he must make a CC. A stored Reforging may be placed with this item to ´´restore´´ it. Once restored Anglachel is worth 5 mp and gives +5 prowess (to a maximum of 12) and -3 to target’s body.

card.name: Angrist
card.text: Unique. Playable at Remains of Thangorodrim or The Pits of Angband. Weapon. +2 prowess. Armor or helmets cannot be used against a strike from the bearer of Angrist. A stored Reforging may be placed with Angrist to restore it. If restored: +4 prowess against Spawn. tap: take Sharp Blade from your discard pile to your hand. Man or Dúnadan only: tap: at any time to prevent a Spawn permanent-event fom being discarded.

card.name: Anguirel
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Playable at any Under-deeps Ruins& Lairs [R] with an automatic-attack. Warrior only: +4 prowess and -3 to the body of strikes bearer faces. For every strike bearer faces he must make a CC (after the attack). This item gives 4 CP to a minion or overt bearer.

card.name: Banishment
card.text: Sage only. Playable on a Ruins & Lairs [R] with an Undead automatic-attack. Tap the sage. The site loses its Undead automatic- attack(s). Sage makes a CC modified by -3. Discard this card if the company plays an item at the site or if the site is discarded or returned to its location deck.

attr.value: (1st) Dark Enchantment (Spell of Cold) — each character faces a strikes with 12 prowess; instead of using prowess against the strike, each character uses his body modified by +3 if he taps;(2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack a hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Angmar.
A sage may discard a Stolen Knowledge card he controls to force the discard of any environment card in play.

(1st) Dark Enchantment (Spell of Cold) — each character faces a strikes with 12 prowess; instead or using prowess against the strike, each character uses his body modified by +3 if he taps;(2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack a hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Angmar.
A sage at this site may tap to bring an environment card from your discard pile to your play deck (reshuffle); a Ringwraith at this site may tap to take an environment card to your hand instead.

card.name: Beadmaker's Healing Runeknife
card.text: Weapon. Playable only at a Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste (or in your starting company on a character with a home site in the Northern Waste). Rune item. May not be included with a starting company. tap: give +1 prowess to the bearer against a strike. Sage only: discard this item to give +1 body to the bearer or another character in his company for the rest of the turn or ttap bearer and discard this item to heal another character in his company.

card.name: Beadmaker's Hunting Runeknife
card.text: Weapon. Playable only at a Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste. Rune item. + 1 prowess (to a maximum of 9). Ranger only: tap: force opponent to search his discard pile for a non-unique Animal hazard creature. This creature immediately attacks bearer as though he was a 1 character company. tAAlternatively, tap: and discard this item to modify the prowess, body and strikes from a non-unique Animal or Wolf attack by -1 (to a minimum of 1).

attr.value: Brigands and Thief may always be played keyed to the site.
Brigands and Thief may always be played keyed to the site.

card.name: Berninga
card.text: Unique. Playable at Ligr Wodaize Berne if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Men (+1), Lossoth (-3), Angmarim (-3), any Orc faction (-2) tap: cancel a Bear attack keyed to regions in the Northern Waste against any of your companies, or cancel the effects of Beorning Skin-changers on a company moving in these regions.

card.name: Bone-harpoon
card.text: Weapon. May only be played at sites in the Northern Waste (or in your starting company on a character with a home site in the Northern Waste). Two- handed. Warrior only: +1 prowess (to a maximum of 6). -1 body to all Wolf or Animal strikes against the bearer. If bearer is assigned a strike from a Wolf or Animal attack, discard this item to make a roll and add bearer’s prowess: if greater than the attack’s prowess, the attack is defeated.

card.name: Canadras
card.text: Unique. Cold-Dragon. May be played at Canadras. 2 strikes. +2 prowess against Dwarves. If Doors of Night is in play, may also be keyed to Lindalf, Narthalf, Rast Losnaeth and Thorenaer and to sites in these regions.

card.name: Canadras Ahunt
card.text: Unique. Any company moving in Lindalf, Narthalf, Rast Losnaeth and/or Thorenaer immediately faces a Cold-Dragon attack (considered a hazard creature attack) — 3 strikes at 13/6; +2 prowess against Dwarves. If Doors of Night is in play, this attack also affects: Dor Bendor, Talath Uichel.

card.name: Canadras at Home
card.text: Unique. Unless Canadras Ahunt is in play, Canadras has an additional automatic-attack: Cold-Dragon — 2 strikes at 16/7; +2 prowess against Dwarves. In addition, each creature attack keyed to a Wilderness [w] in the Northern Waste receives +1 prowess.

card.name: Canadras Roused
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Canadras. Playable at Canadras if the influence check is greater than 12. Modifications: influencer discards a major item (+3) or a greater item (+6). All attacks by manifestations of Canadras against any of your companies are canceled. Any company moving in Lindalf, Narthalf, Rast Losnaeth and/or Thorenaer faces an attack: Cold-Dragon — 2 strikes at 15/7 prowess/body (+2 prowess against Dwarves).

card.name: Cardolanian Whalers
card.text: Men. May be played keyed to East Bay of Forochel, Elven Shores, Eriadoran Coast, Everdalf, Forochel, Gondalf, Minheldolath, Rast Lornaeth, and West Bay of Forochel. Each character faces a strike with 11 prowess. Detainment against hero and covert companies: if 2 characters fail a strike, any subsequent strikes attack normally.

attr.value: men. may be played keyed to east bay of forochel, everdalf, forochel, gondalf, minheldolath, rast lornaeth, and west bay of forochel. each character faces a strike with 11 prowess. detainment against hero and covert companies: if 2 characters fail a strike, any subsequent strikes attack normally.
(1st) Traps — 2 strikes with 7 prowess (2nd) Undead. Dwarf — 1 strike with 10 prowess (attacker chooses defending characters)
a Dwarf at this site may tap to search the play deck or discard pile and take Map to Mithril into hand.
(1st) Traps — 2 strikes with 7 prowess (2nd) Undead. Dwarf — 1 strike with 10 prowess (attacker chooses defending characters)

card.name: Conjure the Tempest
card.text: Sage only. Playable during the site phase at a non-Under- deeps Ruins & Lairs [R] )]. taTap sage and make a roll, add +2 or-3 (before the roll), if you discard (for no effect) a magic card from your hand. You may immediately play a faction normally playable at the site (even if tapped), from hand or discard pile, of the following type: 1-5 Demon or Undead, 6-10 Animal or Wolf, 11-12 Dragon or Drake. On an unmodified roll of 2 or 3 opponent may immediately play a creature of these types from his hand, play deck or discard pile; the creature must normally be keyable to the site or to generic site/region type, except [{]] (c)}]. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

card.name: Cursed Spell-bead
card.text: Playable on a rune item. Each time the bearer uses this item, rotate this card 90° and make a CC modified by -1 for each time rotated. If bearer fails this CC, one non-unique Undead hazard creature may be played immediately on the company from hand or discard pile (all other effects are cancelled).

card.name: Dakalmog
card.text: Unique. Ice-orc. Leader. Discard on a body check of 9. +2 EI against Orcs. +2 EI against Ice-orcs.

card.name: Deathwind
card.text: Environment. Playable on a moving company in the Northern Waste, if Gates of Morning is not in play. A ranger with a home site in the Northern Waste can tap to cancel this card before it resolves. All characters must make body checks for each Northern Waste region they move through. Failing a body check wounds the character, wounded characters become eliminated. The body checks are modified by -2 if character is an Elf, Dwarf, or Umli, and/or if the character has a home site in the Northern Waste, and by +1 if the character has a home site south of Eriador or Wilderland.

card.name: Demon-whale
card.text: Animal. Demon. 1 strike. Attacker chooses defending characters. +2 prowess if company size exceeds 4. May be played keyed to any Coastal Sea [c] regions in the Northern Waste. If Doors of Night is in play, may also be played keyed to Dor Bendor or Elven Shores.

card.name: Demons of the North Winds
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of the Wind-horde. Any company moving through Dor Bendor or Ekkaia faces one attack: Demons — 3 strikes with 12 prowess (detainment against a company containing Eloeklo, Demon of the North Wind). If this attack is defeated, place this card in the hazard player’s side board. This attack also affects any company moving through Eloeklo, Demon of the North Wind’s current region. If Fell Winter is in play, this attack also affects Gondalf, Hûb Uiechel, Narthalf and Thorenaer.

card.name: Durba
card.text: Unique. Ice-orc. +1 prowess when controlling a wolf ally. Discard on a body check of 8.tap: heal a wolf ally under his control.

card.name: Durlach
card.text: Unique. Balrog. Flying. Can use sorcery. +2 to the roll for his company to move between adjacent Under- deeps sites. Durlach’s prowess is only modified by -1 when not tapping to face a strike. May not have followers and may not move to any site other than his home sites. If not at his home site, he must (attempt to) move to one of his home sites the same turn; if this results in illegal movement, return him to his home site and wound him.

card.name: Durlach, Bane of the North
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Durlach. Balrog. Spawn. 2 strikes. May be played keyed to Eithel Morgoth and The Under-forges. If The Black Enemy’s Wrath is in play, may also be played keyed to any Under-deeps site with a surface site in the Northern Waste, and to Narthalf and sites in this region. Cannot be affected by spells or magic cards.If played as a permanent-event,

attr.value: Any Gold Ring stored at this site is automatically tested (modify the roll by -2). If any of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are canceled.
Any creature normally playable at any Under-deeps site may be played here.
Any creature otherwise playable at any Under-deeps site may be played here. Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment.

card.name: Eloeklo, Demon of the North Wind
card.graphics: Eloeklo Demon of the North Wind.jpg
card.text: Unique. Demon. Spirit of Ice and Cold. Manifestation of Eloekklo, Lindor’s Bane. Playable at any Ruins & Lairs[R] in the Northern Waste, if the company plays Conjure the Tempest with a result for Demon. Discard if the company moves south of the Northern Waste and Long Winter or Fell Winter is not in play. tap: cancel the effect of any environment for his company. If his controlling character is not an avatar, opponent makes a roll during your organization phase and subtracts 3: controlling character is eliminated if the result is greater than his mind.

card.name: Eloeklo, Lindor's Bane
card.text: Unique. Demon. Spirit of Ice and Cold. 2 strikes. If Long Winter or Fell Winter is in play may be played against a moving company keyed to any region or site in the Northern Waste. Modify Eloeklo, Lindor’s Bane’s prowess and body by -3/-3 if the company uses Fire effects (e.g. The Fiery Blade, Wizard’s Fire, etc.) against the attack/strike. As a short-event, take one environment hazard from your sideboard to your hand.

card.name: Elves of Evermist
card.text: Unique. Playable at Evermist if the influence check is greater than 12. Standard Modifications: Elves (+1), Elves with home site in the Northern Waste (+3) tap: untap the Keeper of the Lodge Elf, if at Evermist.This card is worth an additional mp for each stored Tear of Yavanna.

attr.value: (1st) Elvish Wards — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess —weapons do not modify and cannot be cancelled—(2nd) Elves — 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against a covert company).

*Any gold ring may be played at this site. Any company moving to this site has its hazard limit increased by 2. Opponent may take Elven Wards from his play deck or discard pile when this site is revealed as a new site. A Ringwraith may not move to this site.

card.name: Fell-bear
card.text: Animal. Bear. 1 strike. Playable on a company moving in the Northern Waste with at least 3 Wilderness[w] in its site path. Also playable keyed to any non-Dragon’s lair Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste. If the company contains Dwarves or Elves and Fell-bear’s attack or strike is cancelled you may play him again from your discard pile against the same company on the next turn, not counting against the hazard limit and regardless the site path.

card.name: Fellowship
card.text: Only playable at a Haven [H] during the organization phase on a company that has 4 or more characters and allies. +1 to prowess and +1 to CC for all characters and allies in the company. Discard this card if a character or ally joins or leaves the company for any reason.

card.name: Forod
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on a company at a site in The Northern Waste containing a character with a home site in The Northern Waste. If the company moves with region movement to another site in The Northern Waste, the site path contains only Wilderness [www] and the hazard limit is increased by 1.

card.name: Friend of the Kelvar
card.text: Place this card in your mp. You may place any animal factions you have in play under this card, but factions may not be duplicated under this card. This card is worth 2 mp when there are at least 4 animal factions under this card played at sites within the same territory. This card is worth full mp if you are Radagast.Cannot be duplicated by a given player for a given territory.

card.name: Friends of Winter
card.text: Unique. This card is worth 3 mp when you have the Aerfaroth, Helechoth and Lossoth factions in play. Additionally, if you receive this card’s mp, these factions can only be influenced by an avatar or character with a home site in the Northern Waste. Information is considered to be playable by your characters at any Border-hold [B] in the Northern Waste.

card.name: Galgrin's Hammer
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Playable at Canadras. Values in parenthesis apply to Umit bearer. +1 to bearer’s prowess. +2 EI against Umli and Men with a home site in the Northern Waste. tap: if bearer is a male sage, Dwarf or Umit to place a Reforging in the company with an item that can be restored (as if stored).

card.name: Galgrinic
card.text: Unique. + 1 prowess against Dragons and Drakes. +1 EI against Umit characters. + 2 EI against the Umli Traders faction.

card.name: Gates of Morning
card.text: Environment. When Gates of Morning is played, all environment hazard cards in play are immediately discarded, and all hazard environment effects are canceled. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Ghash!
card.text: Balrog specific. Playable on a company during the organization phase, if you have Master of Dread and Fear in play. You may bring this card from sideboard into your play deck (reshuffle) during your organization phase. For one of your companies all CC are modified by +2 while this card is in play. Discard if Master of Dread and Fear leaves play. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Gondring
card.text: Unique. Female. Ice-Dragon. May be played at Gondring’s Lair. 2 strikes. Attacker chooses defending characters. If Doors of Night is in play, may also be keyed to East Bay of Forochel, Forochel, Rast Losnaeth and West Bay of Forochel andto sites in these regions.

card.name: Gondring Ahunt
card.text: Unique. Any company moving in East Bay of Forochel, Forochel, Rast Losnaeth, and/or West Bay of Forochel immediately faces a female Ice-Dragon attack (considered a hazard creature attack) — 3 strikes at 12/7. If Doors of Night is in play, this attack also affects: Elven Shores, Everdalf, Minheldolath and Númeriador.

card.name: Gondring at Home
card.text: Unique. Unless Gondring Ahunt is in play, Gondring’s Lair has an additional automatic-attack: Female Ice-Dragon — 2 strikes at 15/8. In addition, each company moving through a Northern Waste region has its hazard limit increased by 2 for every Coastal Sea [c] in its site path.

card.name: Gondring Roused
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Gondring. Female. Playable at Gondring’s Lair if the influence check is greater than 12. Modifications: influencer discards a major item (+4) or a greater item (+7). All attacks by manifestations of Gondring against any of your companies are canceled. Any company moving in East Bay of Forochel, Forochel, Rast Losnaeth and/or West Bay of Forochel faces anattack: Ice-Dragon — 2 strikes at 12/8 prowess/body (attacker chooses defending characters).

card.name: Great Seagull
card.text: Unique. Animal. Flying. Playable by a Dúnadan,Elf or Wizard at any tapped or untapped non- Haven [H], non-Dragon’s Lair site in a Coastal Sea [c] region (or adjacent region) in the Northern Waste. tap: cancel a strike directed against him. tap: force opponent to reveal all hazards from his hand; for either use, the next time Great Seagull would become untapped make him tapped instead.

card.name: Great Song of Awakening
card.text: Unique. Playable at Evermist on the Keeper of the Lodge Elf, if Land Reborn has been rotated 360°. Tap an Elf during the site phase atEvermist and make a roll (+1 for each other Elf tapping in support); if greater than 7 rotate this card 90°. For each time rotated this card is worth 1 mp and has the following effects (cumulative) for companies in the Northern Waste: One: Mordó and Morgoth’s Ring cannot be played (discard if in play). Two: all creatures keyable to Wilderness [w] or Shadow-land [s]need an extra Wilderness [w] or Shadow-land [s] in the site path to beplayed. Three: all CC from magic cards are modified by an extra -2.Four: if your opponent is Durlach, Hoarmûrath, Lomaw or The Witch-king you win the game.

card.name: Greater Spell-bead
card.text: Playable at any non-Dragon’s lair Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste, if the company discards (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card it controls. Rune item. +2 EI against characters with a lower mind than bearer. Warrior only: +1 to prowess and body (to a maximum of 10) when facing an Animal, Wolf or Awakened Plant attack. Scout only: tap: bring a scout skill card from your discard pile to your play deck. Diplomat only: tap: give +3 to an influence attempt against an animal, Ent or Man faction playable in the Northern Waste. Bearer makes a CC when this item becomes tapped

card.name: Grinding Ice
card.text: Environment. For each company moving through Elven Shores or a Coastal Sea [c] region in the Northern Waste, one Coastal Sea [c] in the company’s site path becomes a Wilderness [w]. May also be played as a hazard, if a company moves through the above regions.

card.name: Guardian of the Fire-gates
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Durlach. Spawn. Playable at The Under-forges. His controller may not move, unless you discard a magic card from your hand during the organization phase. You may discard a magic card from your hand to give him +2 prowess and body or to untap him. Discard if his company moves to a non-Under-deeps site. During your organization phase, opponent makes a roll and subtracts 2: if the result is greater than the controlling character’s mind, the character is eliminated.

card.name: Helechoth
card.text: Unique. Playable at Hyvät Kalat if the influence check is greater than 7. Standard Modifications: Men (+1). tap: cancel an Animal, Wolf or Giant attack keyed to Lindalf or Thorenaer by type or name. This faction is worth 2 mp if the Wind-horde faction is not in play.

card.name: Helecthil, Light of the North
card.text: Environment. When Helecthil, Light of the North is played, all environment long-events in play are immediately discarded. Helecthil, Light of the North is not discarded when Doors of Night is played, but when either Skies of Fire, The Sun Shone Fiercely or Sun is played. The hazard limit for every hero and covert company in the Northern Waste is reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 2). Cancel all environment effects which cause a company in the Northern Waste to return to their site of origin. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Heledwen
card.text: Unique. Nando. +1 prowess when Helectil, Light of the North is in play.tap: cancel any ongoing effect of Jaänaïnen.

attr.value: Any Elf-hold in the Northern Waste
This site is considered a Haven [H] for the purposes of healing and playing hazards.
(1st) Elves — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess (detainment against covert companies);(2nd) Elves — 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies).

An overt company must tap an untapped character (ifavailable) if this site is revealed as its new site. Any company moving to this site has its hazard limit increased by 1. Snow-elves may always be played against an overt company at this site.

card.name: Hibernating Troll
card.text: Troll. 1 Strike. Only playable on-guard at a Ruins & Lairs [LR] in the Northern Waste. Before resolving the attack make a roll: if the result minus company size is greater than 4, the attack is canceled. If Hibernating Troll is defeated, the first item played does not tap the site: otherwise the site is tapped. Each warrior in the company lowers the prowess and body of Hibernating Troll by 1.

attr.value: troll. 1 strike. only playable on-guard at a ruins & lairs [lr] in the northern waste. before resolving the attack make a roll: if the result minus company size is greater than 4, the attack is canceled. if hibernating troll is defeated, the first item played does not tap the site: otherwise the site is tapped. each warrior in the company lowers the prowess and body of hibernating troll by 1.

card.name: Hithailin
card.text: Ritual. Playable on an Elf at Evermist. +2 to his CC for spells. Elves in his company may store any Information or Lost Knowledge resource they control during the site phase at Orod Certhas: place it with the site and you may take one spell from your discard pile or sideboard to your hand. Orod Certhas is never discarded or returned to the location deck if there is a resource stored there. This card may be stored at any Elf-hold outside the Northern Waste. If stored, any resource stored at Orod Certhas is worth one mp. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Hyvät Kalat
card.text: Lossoth faction is playable at this site. If Gates of Morning is in play, this site is considered a Port.

attr.value: If Gates of Morning is in play, this site is considered a Port.

card.name: Ice-drake
card.text: Ice-drake. 2 strikes. May be played keyed to Angmar or Gundabad. May also be keyed (by type) to to any Wilderness [w] or Coastal Sea [c] region in the Northern Waste.

card.name: Ice-drakes of the Ered Úmarth
card.text: Unique. Playable at Pendrath na-Udûn if the influence check is greater than 12.Modifications: discard a magic card from hand (+3), for each major or greater item in your hoard (+2). Each of opponent’s companies moving through Gondalf, Narthalf or Minheldolath must make a roll: if lower than 7 it faces an attack: Ice-drakes — 3 strikes at 15/5 prowess/body.

card.name: Ice-giant
card.text: Giant. 1 strike. May be played keyed to Gondalf, Lindalf, Minheldolath, Narthalf, Rast Losnaeth, or Thorenaer. May also be played keyed to Ruins & Lairs [R] in these regions. If Doors of Night is in play, may also be played keyed to any non-Coastal Sea [c] region in the Northern Waste.

card.name: Ice-troll
card.text: Discard on a body check of result of 9. +1 prowess against Dwarves. -1/-2 to his prowess and body if not in the Northern Waste.

attr.value: Any non-Dragon's lair Ruins & Lairs in the Northern Waste

card.name: Into the Unknown
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a moving company. Company may move from a site of origin in 1 of the following regions to a new site in 1 of the following regions: East Bay of Forochel, Ekkaia, Elven Shores, Gondalf, Helkeär, Hûb Uichel, Lindon, Thorenaer, or West Bay of Forochel. The site path is [ccc] and the hazard limit is decreased by 2 to a minimum of 2.

card.name: Iron Mountains
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a company containing a ranger. If the company moves with region movement, tapap a ranger to move as if the following pairs of regions were adjacent: Angmar and Everdalf, Angmar and Dragon Gap, Angmar and Talath Uichel, Grey Mountain Narrows and Forovirkain, Gundabad and Talath Uichel, Gundabad and Everdalf. The company faces an attack at the beginning of its movement/hazard phase: Orcs — 2 strikes with 7 prowess. Alternatively, if the site moved to is in any of the regions listed above, the hazard limit is reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 2). Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

attr.value: Men — each character faces a strike with 6 prowess (detainment).

If Doors of Night is in play this site is in West Bay of Forochel. Dwarf, Man and Umit characters may heal at this site. Aerfaroth may be played at this site. After the successful play of a faction at this site you may play from discard pile one minor item only playable in the Northern Waste.
Men — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess (detainment against covert companies).

If Doors of Night is in play this site is in West Bay of Forochel. Burning Rick, Cot and Tree, Long Grevious Siege or Tempest of Fire may not be played on this site. Non-overt characters with a home site in the Northern Waste may heal at this site. *Tap such a character to place this site with him (it is not discarded or returned to the location deck). Discard this card from the company to cancel any attack keyed to a Coastal Sea [c] region by name or type.

card.name: Jäänainen
card.text: Unique. Any company moving in the Northern Waste containing a male non-Elf character faces one attack:Spirit of Ice and Cold — 1 strike (attacker chooses defending characters). If Snowstorm or Long Winter is in play this attack also affects companies at a Border-hold [B] or Ruins & Lair [R] in the Northern Waste. If this attack wounds any male non-Elf character, Jäänainen becomes a permanent-event: each male non-Elf character wounded by Jaanainen must make a CC modified by -2 during his untap phase until he is healed. If no such character is in play, discard this card.

card.name: Karhunkäsi
card.text: Unique. +2 prowess against Wolves and Bears. -1 to all of his CC.-1 to his influence checks.

card.name: Keeper of the Lodge
card.text: Playable on an Elf at Evermist with a mind greater than 6. Tap the Elf if untapped. Target Elf costs only 3 points ofinfluence to control but cannot be controlled by EI. +1 to his CC. All attempts to return target Elf to your hand are cancelled. ta Bearer may tap during your end-of-turn phase at Evermist to bring a ritual from your discard pile to your play deck. Discard this card if bearer is at a site more than 3 regions away from Evermist or outside the Northern Waste, or if in a company with an Elf with a higher mind. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Kénwe Foryaren
card.text: Unique. Noldo. May use any bow regardless of the card’s text. When Kénwe Foryaren is brought into play, you may immediately search your play deck or discard pile for a minor item or short-event with a healing effect. Discard if his company ever moves outside of the Northern Waste or Eriador, or if a Wizard is in his company outside of the organization phase.

attr.value: Evermist, any Border-hold in Northern Waste

card.name: Kirrauko
card.text: Unique. Playable at any site after the company has faced a Spawn or a Nazgûl automatic- attack. Weapon. Axe. Two-handed. Cancels all dark enchantments targeting bearer. Warrior only: +3 to prowess (to a maximum of 10; +4 to prowess to a maximum of 11 and -2 to strike’s body against Demon and Spawn). tap: at any time when facing a strike to untap bearer.

card.name: Konihrabn
card.text: Unique. Agent. +2 EI against Man factions playable in the Northern Waste or Angmar. Agent only: tap: make any non-unique Orc creature playable on a company leaving his current Border-hold [B] or Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste.

card.name: Kragbogk the Berserker
card.text: Unique. Discard on a body check result of 5. Kragbogk’s prowess is only modified by -1 when wounded. -3 to his influence attempts.

attr.value: (1st) Orcs — 3 strikes with 8 prowess; (2nd) Wolves — 2 strikes with 7 prowess
Orcs — 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against an overt company).
Ice-orcs faction is playable at this site. Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment.

card.name: Land Reborn
card.text: Unique. You may bring this card into play from sideboard, if you have a company at the same site in the Northern Waste as a manifestation of Radagast and you discard (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card. For each stored Tear of Yavanna in play, rotate this card 90°; for every time rotated it is worth 2 mp and the following effects apply (cumulative): One: +1 to your hand size. Neither so Ancient nor so Potent cannot target a stored Tear of Yavanna. Two: Spirits of Ice and Cold attacks receive -2 strikes and -4 prowess (to a minumum of 1). Make a roll for each Deathwind, Snowstorm, Fell Winter or Long Winter; if result is greater than 6 it is discarded. Three: each overt character in the Northern Waste receives -1 prowess and their controlling player -1 hand size.Four: all non-Coastal Sea [c] regions in the Northern Waste become aWilderness [w].

card.name: Legacy of Carcaroth
card.text: Each player may discard one Wolf hazard creature from hand during the end-of-turn phase to take one Wolf hazard creature from his discard pile to his hand. Discard when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

attr.value: Lossoth faction is playable at this site.
Men — each character faces a strike with 6 prowess (detainment against a covert company).

card.name: Lieutenant of Morgoth
card.text: Balrog specific. Playable your Balrog if he controls a Demon fána. If Flame of Udûn is played on your Balrog, he can use sorcery; if Master of Dread and Fear, he can use spirit-magic, and if Strangling Coils, he can use shadow-magic. Discard this card if you have no Demon fána card in play on your Balrog at the end of your organization phase.

attr.value: This site is considered a Free-hold [F] if Gates of Morning is in play.
This site is considered a Free-hold [F] if Gates of Morning is in play.
Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to any region in the Northern Waste.
Tap an Elf during the site phase to attempt to remove any corruption cards on him: +2 to the roll.
If Eloeklo Demon of the North Wind is in the company, opponent may take True Spirits of the North Wind from his play deck or discard pile at the beginning of the movement hazard.
(1st) Orcs — 3 strikes with 7 prowess; (2nd) Men — 2 strikes with 10 prowess (attacker chooses defending characters)
A company leaving this site may move as if Angmar and Anduin Vales were adjacent.

tap: and make a body check for a sage in your company modified by -1; if successful, place this site card (or another token) on the sage: he can use sorcery. Otherwise he is eliminated. A company leaving this site may move as if Angmar and Anduin Vales were adjacent.

card.name: Los'pindel
card.text: Unique. Nando. +2 EI against Elves and Men with a home site in the Northern Waste, and Elf and Man factions playable at sites in the Northern Waste. +2 prowess and +1 body when moving through or at a site in the Northern Waste. When Los’pindel is at Helloth, you may keep 1 more card than normal in hand. Los’pindel makes a CC every organization phase if not in the Northern Waste. -2 mp if eliminated.

card.name: Losrandir
card.text: Playable at any tapped or untapped Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste, if the influence check is greater than 10Standard Modifications: non-overt character with a home site in the Northern Waste (+2), if Radagast is your Wizard (+3) Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

card.name: Lossadan Hunters
card.text: Men. 4 strikes (detainment and -2 prowess against covert and hero companies). May be played keyed to East Bay of Forochel, Everdalf, Forochel,Lindalf, Minheldolath, Rast Losnaeth, or West Bay of Forochel. May also be played keyed to Border-holds [B] and non-Dragon’s lair Ruins & Lairs [R] in these regions. Lossadan Hunters receive +2 prowess and +1 strike if played keyed to a Border-hold [B] against an overt company.

card.name: Lossandamundar
card.text: Animal. 2 strikes. May be played keyed to any non-Coastal Sea [c] region in the Northern Waste

card.name: Lossidil
card.text: Unique. Playable at Helloth if the influence check is greater than 10. Standard Modifications: Elves (+1), Elves with a home site in the Northern Waste (+3), Elves with home site Thranduil’s Halls (-2), Dwarves (-2), Men (-2). tap: at any time to allow Snow-elves to be keyed to any region in the Northern Waste against an overt company.

card.name: Lugronk
card.text: Unique. Balrog specific. Leader. +2 EI against Orcs and Trolls. +2 EI against Balrog specific characters. Discard on a body check of 9.

card.name: Major Spell-bead
card.text: Playable at any non-Dragon’s lair Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste. Rune item. Bearer cannot be targetted by disease hazards. Ranger only: tap: cancel a non-automatic-attack by Orc, Trolls, Dwarves, Giants or Men in the Northern Waste. Alternatively, tatap: give bearer +4 prowess against a strike he is facing; discard this item after the strike. Bearer makes a CC when this item becomes tapped.

attr.value: Hoard battle-gear items may be played at this site.
Hoard battle-gear items may be played at this site.

card.name: Marin
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess when in the Northern Waste.

card.name: Master of Dread and Fear
card.text: Balrog specific. Demon fána. Playable during your organization phase on your Balrog avatar. Return this card to your hand: when you play another Demon fána card, or, if you choose, during your organization phase. Balrog may not move. +5 to your GI. Balrog gains the diplomat and sage skill and may have followers. You may keep one more card than normal in your hand. Tap your avatar to force a character at a site in the same region as his current site to make a CC modified by -1. Once during each of your organization phases, discard a card from hand to look at up to 3 random cards at once from your opponent’s hand.

card.name: Minor Spell-bead
card.text: Playable only at a non-Dragon’s Lair Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste (or in your starting company on a character with a home site in the Northern Waste). Rune item. +1 EI against characters with a lower mind than bearer’s. Sage only: when bearer is required to tap for the use of a skill card he may tap this item instead. Bearer makes a CC.

card.name: Mordó
card.text: Unique. Environment. Every creature attack without an asterix (*) keyed to a region or site in the Northern Waste receives +1 prowess. The hazard limit is increased by 1 for every hero or covert company in the Northern Waste. Every hero character moving through triple Wilderness [www] or Shadow-land [s] in the Northern Waste must make a CC at the end of the movement/hazard phase (only one CC per turn per character). All hero factions playable at sites in the Northern Waste are worth one less mp (to a minimum of 1).

attr.value: (1st) Orcs — 4 strikes with 8 prowess; (2nd) Orcs — 3 strikes with 9 prowess
Creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment.
(1st) Orcs — 4 strikes with 8 prowess; (2nd) Orcs — 3 strikes with 9 prowess
s w w w w w w s

Only non-unique Orc and Troll characters may be brought into play at this site, unless the character has Mornost as its home site. Any Gold Ring stored at this site is automatically tested (modify the roll by -2). If 1 of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are canceled.

card.name: Morvran
card.text: Unique. +1 EI against Men with a home site in Eriador or the Northern Waste. +1 prowess when bearing a treasure. May not be in a company with hero Elves or Dúnedain with a higher mind. Any CC by Elves in his company is modified by -1.

card.name: Nadash
card.text: Unique. Ice-orc. Discard on a body check of 8. If Nadash controls a wolf ally and is at or moving to a site in The Northern Waste, he gainst the scout skill.

card.name: Nestador
card.text: Unique. Noldo. +2 EI against Elves. When Nestador is at Evermist you may keep 1 more card than normal in your hand. Healing cards and effects affect all characters in his company. -3 mp if eliminated.

card.name: Ningarach
card.text: Unique. Marsh-Drake. 2 strikes. Play-able keyed to Amon Anlug. If Doors of Night, Gates of Morning or Grinding Ice is in play, may also be played keyed to Everdalf, Lindalf or Thorenaer, or East Bay of Forochel and at non-Haven [H] sites in these regions. + 2 prowess if keyed to Amon Anlug or a Swamp in these regions

card.name: Orcs of the Bleak Mountains
card.text: Unique. Playable at Mornost if the influence check is greater than 10. Standard Modifications: Ice-orcs (+2), Orcs of Angmar (-2). Once in play, the number required to influence this faction is 0. tap: at any time to allow a non-unique Orc hazard creature to be keyed to Narthalf or its adjacent regions.

attr.value: Spirits of Ice and Cold — 2 strikes with 7 prowess —resources which affect Undead also affect these Spirits—
Spirits of Ice and Cold — 2 strikes with 7 prowess —resources which affect Undead also affect these Spirits—
True Spirits of the North Wind may always be played keyed to this site against an overt company.

card.name: Peaceful Coexistence
card.text: Playable on Radagast or a character with home site Beorn’s House,Ligr Wodaize Berne, or Woodmen-town; if not in play, such charactermay now be brought into play under Radagast’s EI at one of the above sites (regardless of any rule). Bearer may tap to cancel all attacks from a Wolf or Animal hazard creature with 1 strike for each of its attacks. If keyable to regions other than Coastal Sea [c], the creature becomes an ally under his control, with 1 mind, a prowess of normal -7 and a body of 8. Place this card with the creature, it is worth 1 ally mp.

attr.value: A More or Less Decent Giant is playable here (as if at a site in a mountain region).
Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment. Conjure the Tempest may be played at this site as if it were a Ruins & Lairs [R]
Port. If Doors of Night is in play, treat this site as a Ruins & Lairs [R] instead.
Men — each character faces a strike with 6 prowess
Port. If Doors of Night is in play, treat this site as a Ruins & Lairs [R] instead.

card.name: Pitää Kalasta
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess against Animals and Wolves. tap: cancel a Trap-attack. Any flattery or offering attempt against (characters in) his company is cancelled and Foolish Words does not affect him.

card.name: Press on towards Shelter
card.text: Any company may move with 1 extra region in their site path if moving to a Haven [H]. If Gates of Morning or Helectil, Light of the North is in play, this also applies to companies moving to a Free-hold [F].

attr.value: Umli Traders faction is playable at this site.
Umli Traders faction is playable at this site.

card.name: Pursuit through Barren Lands
card.text: Playable on a company containing a leader with a home site in Angmar or the Northern Waste, or on Celedhring. You may startthe game with this card in lieu of a minor item. Rotate this card 90° when the company is in the Northern Waste and you either: - successfully play Ice-drakes of the Ered Úmarth, an Information resource, or a manifestation of Eloekklo, Lindor’s Bane; - engage in CvCC with a company containing an Elf; - defeat an Elf hazard creature. If rotated 360°, invert this card if the company is at a tapped Evermist. Only one copy of this card may be inverted. If inverted this card may be stored during the site phase at a Darkhaven [K] for 5 mp: all attacks by Elves are modified by -1 to strikes and prowess.

card.name: Raudabern
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess against Orcs. +2 EI against Umit and against characters and factions playable at Ligr Wodaize Berne. Raudabern suffers no prowess penalty when he is tapped or wounded.

card.name: Rays of Helecthil
card.text: Environment. Playable on a company in the Northern Waste if Doors of Night is in play. Discard a corruption card on a character in the company or an environment card that affects the company’s movement or site path. Alternatively, you may tap a non-Elf to untap an Elf character for every region in the company’s site path this turn. This card may also be played as a hazard: untap all Elves and characters with a home site in the Northern Waste, tap all other characters and allies with a mind stat. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

card.name: Reforging
card.text: Sage only during the site phase at an untapped site where Information is playable. tT Tap sage and site. Sage may not untap until Reforging is stored at a Haven [H]. During your organization phase, you may tap a sage at a Haven and discard a stored Reforging to retrieve any battle-gear minor or major item from your discard pile. The item must be placed under the control of a character in the sage’s company.

card.name: Ring of Detection
card.text: Unique. Ring. Playable at any Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste. tap: if bearer is a sage or Elf to reveal an on-guard card played on his company. If the card could never be legally revealed at the site as an on-guard it must be discarded. Bearer makes a CC modified by -1.

card.name: Ring of Healing
card.text: Unique. Ring. Playable at Evermist. tap: during your organization phase, if bearer is an Elf sage with mind greater than 5, to heal a wounded character in his company and make a roll: if the result is greater than 9, character may heal from wounded to untapped, otherwise he heals but is tapped. Bearer makes a CC modified by - 1.

card.name: Ring of the Protector
card.text: Unique. Ring. Playable at Malgolodh’s Cave. Also playable as minor item after a successful influence attempt against a Man faction in the Northern Waste. A non-overt bearer may choose to have a strike he faces (except from this item) be ineffectual: bearer must immediately face a strike (cannot be cancelled, type is bearer’s race) with prowess equal to the original strike -3; if the strike is successful, bearer is taken prisoner at his current site or site moving to (Rescue Attack: 1 strike with a prowess equal to bearer’s base prowess +7).

card.name: Róin
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess when in the Northern Waste. tap: take Profitable Trade from your discard pile to your hand.

attr.value: Lossoth faction is playable at this site.
Men — each character faces a strike with 5 prowess (detainment against covert company).

card.name: Skis and Fur-coats
card.text: Playable on a company at a Border-hold [B]. taYou may tap a ranger to cancel the effects of one Fell-winter, Long-winter, Snowstorm or Snow in the Mountains for the company: make make a roll for each character in the company, modified by adding the number of Wilderness [w] in the company’s site path, -2 if the character is a ranger and/or has a home site in the Northern Waste, and +2 if a Hobbit or Troll. If the result is greater than the character’s body he is wounded.Discard this card if the company moves to a site not in the Northern Waste or its adjacent regions.

card.name: Snow in the Mountains
card.text: Environment. Playable on a company moving through Angmar, Gundabad, High Pass, Withered Heath or any Mountain region. If Fell Winter or Long Winter is in play, may also be played on a company moving through Redhorn Gate, Grey Mountain Narrows, or Iron Hills. Each non-elf character in the company makes a roll, adding his base prowess. If the result is less than 9, the character taps. If he was already tapped, the company must immediately return to its site of origin. Cannot be duplicated on given company unless Fell Winter and Long Winter are both in play.

card.name: Snow-blindness
card.text: Disease. Playable on a character moving in the Northern Waste. Make a roll for the character modified by +1 for every Wilderness [w] in the Northern Waste in his site path, and by +2 if the character’s home site is outside of the Northern Waste. If the result is higher than target character’s body, place this card on him; otherwise discard this card. Character receives -2 prowess and losses scout and/or ranger skills while bearing this card. taTap a ranger in his company and discard (for nor effect) a card with a healing effect to discard this card.

card.name: Snow-elves
card.text: Elves. 4 strikes. Detainment and -2 prowess againsthero companies. Playable keyed to Dor Bendor, Thorenaer, Everdalf, Lindalf, Talath Oiohelka or Talath Uichel and to non-Haven [H] sites in these regions. If Helecthil, Light of the North is in play, may be keyed to any region in the Northern Waste. If all characters in the company face a strike and if all are successful, the company must immediately return to their site of origin.

card.name: Snow-lion
card.text: Animal. 1 strike. Attacker chooses defending characters. May be played keyed to any Wilderness [w] region in the Northern Waste, or regions adjacent to these if Fell Winter or Long Winter is in play. May only be played against a company with 3 characters or less. +2 prowess if the company contains only one character or any Hobbits. +1 to any resulting body check. Scout only resources cannot target Snow-lion, and this card cancels any ongoing effect of such resources.

card.name: Snow-troll
card.text: Troll. 2 strikes. May be played keyed to any non-Coastal Sea [c] region in the Northern Waste, and to Ruins & Lairs [R] in these regions. Attacker chooses defending characters, if defending company does not contain a ranger. If Fell Winter or Long Winter is in play, it may be played keyed to all regions in the Northern Waste and all adjacent regions.

card.name: Snow-trolls
card.text: Unique. Playable at any non-Dragon’s lair Ruins & Lairs [R] or Shadow-hold [S] in the Northern Waste if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Stone Trolls (+2), Ice-orcs (-2), Wargs of Forochel (-2). tap: cancel a Troll attack against one of your companies keyed to a region or a Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste.

card.name: Song of Appeasement
card.text: Playable on a Spirit-namer after his company has faced an Animal, Wolf, Spider, Awakened Plant, Maia orSpirit attack. The Spirit-namer may tap to discard a hazard permanent or long-event in play, or make a roll with 1 dice (add the number of other Spirit-namers in the company); the hazard limit for his company is lowered by half the result (round down). On an unmodified roll of 1 or 2 opponent may immediately play Spirit Crime or The Balance of Things on the company from discard pile or sideboard. Spirit-namer makes a CC.

card.name: Spirit Crime
card.text: Corruption. Playable on a character in the Northern Waste, if he has played a spirit magic resource this turn, or after the successfull play of an item at a site with an Undead or Spirit automatic- attack. -1 to all his rolls. Additionally, +1 to his company’s hazard limit, and all characters in the company have their CC for transferring items, as well as their rolls for offering attempts, influence attempts and riddling rolls modified by -2. Discard this card if opponent has Friends of Winter in play. Bearer may discard a rune item he controls to discard this card. During the site phase at a Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste, a sage in the company may tap and make a roll to attempt to remove this card; if the result is greater than 6 discard this card.

card.name: Spirit-abuse
card.text: Spirit-magic. Playable on a spirit-magic user, or on aMan or sage character with a home site in the Northern Waste. Unless he is a Ringwraith, he makes a CC modified by -3. Character may use hero rune items as if they were minion items. If bearing a rune item, one defeated non-unique Animal or Wolf creature may be placed with this card. Before CvCC at a site in the Northern Waste, opponent’s company must face this creature (return it to the appropriate mp pile afterwards, or if this card is discarded). Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Spirit-namer
card.text: Playable on a sage with a home site in the Northern Waste, if bearing a rune item. Character becomes a spirit-namer and may tap to discard a disease card played on (a character in) the company. +1 to his CC. tap: while at a Border-hold [B] in the Northern Waste to take Song of Appeasement from your discard pile to your hand.Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Sprautabern
card.text: Unique. Grey Agent. +1 prowess against Orcs and Wolves. Skin-changer may be played on Sprautabern (as if on Beorn). Agent only: may move 2 regions per agent action if moving in the Northern Waste. tap: during movement/hazard phase to attack a company moving to his current Ruins & Lairs [R] or Shadow-hold [S] or to his home site.

card.name: Striuk'ir
card.text: Unique. Nando. +1 prowess against Orcs and Wolves. +2 EI against Elf and animal factions.

attr.value: Any site in a Wilderness in the Northern Waste

card.name: Tear of Yavanna
card.text: Playable at any Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste on a character with an inverted Vision Path, if Land Reborn is in play.taTap the character, discard Vision Path, and make a roll: add 1 for each Elf and sage in the company and for each Tear of Yavanna in play. If result is greater than 9, this card is successfully played (otherwise take card back to hand). Character may not untap while bearing this card, but may heal (wounded to tapped) during untap phase. +1 to his body. This card may only be stored during the site phase at Evermist. tap: cancel an Awakened Plant attack against bearer’s company. You may include up to 4 copies of this card in deck and sideboard combined.

attr.value: Animals (Death Shrews) — 7 strikes with 4 prowess; the body check of any character wounded by this attack is modified by +2.
Hollow on the Left Breast may be played at this site, regardless of the character's race.
Animals (Death Shrews) — 7 strikes with 4 prowess; the body check of any character wounded by this attack is modified by +2.
Wargs of the Forochel may be played at this site. Shoot in the Eye may be played at this site, regardless of the character's race.

card.name: The Angulion
card.text: Unique. Can use sorcery and shadow-magic.tap: during organization phase to take a magic card from your discard pile to your hand, if you discard a magic card from your hand and wound another character in his company.

attr.value: Kula Dulakurth (0), Ancient Maze (9), Ruins of Kheledkhizdín (6), The Wind-deeps (5)

(1st) Orcs — 5 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against companies containing an Orc or Troll);(2nd) Opponent may play from hand as an automatic-attack one creature normally keyable to Ruins & Lairs [R]
Non-Nazgûl attacks keyed to the site are not considered detainment agains black players' companies.

card.name: The Crist-i-Sûlhoth
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Rune item. Playable at any Ruins and Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste, if a manifestation of The Wind-horde or of Eloeklo is in play (or has been played). Warrior only: +1 to prowess (to a maximum of 9; against a Demon or Spawn strike: +3 to prowess to a maximum of 12, +2 to body to a maximum of 10, and -2 to strike’s body). Sage only: tap: to search your play deck for True Spirits of the North Wind, when bearer’s company faces a manifestation of Eloeklo.

card.name: The Pack at the Door
card.text: Playable if Doors of Night is in play. Non-unique Animal, Spider and Wolf hazard creatures may be played keyed to Border-lands [b], Border-holds [[B] or Ruins & Lairs [R]. Such creatures must normally be playable keyed to a non-Coastal Sea [c] region. Additionally, if such a creature is only keyable to regions by name, it may only be played if the company is moving through a region in the same territory as one of the listed regions, or is at a site in such a territory.

card.name: The Prison's Spell is Fading
card.text: Durlach specific. Playable on Durlach, if Flame of Udûn is played on him. Any magic-using non- avatar characters at his current site are discarded. Discard a magic card from hand to rotate this card 90° (or place a token; maximum of 4 times). Rotate this card 90° back (or remove a token) to allow Durlach to move to a non-Darkhaven [K] Under-deeps site, or move 1 extra region if moving with region movement. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: The Runeknife of Risinth
card.text: Unique. Rune item. Weapon. Playable at any site in the Northern Waste, if the company has faced an attack by Spirits of Cold and Ice this turn. Discard (for no effect) a magic card from hand during the site phase to tap any character or ally with a body stat at the site and untap bearer. Bearer must make a CC as if the magic card was played. tap: after a successful strike from bearer in CvCC and remove a Tear of Yavanna borne by the defeated character from play.

attr.value: Eithel Morgoth (0), Ancient Maze (6), The Iron-deeps (4), The Pits of Angband (7)

Only non-unique Orc and Troll characters may be brought into play at this site, unless the character has The Under-forges as its home site. Any gold ring stored at this site is automatically tested (modify the roll by -2). If 1 of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled.
Eithel Morgoth (0), Ancient Maze (6), The Iron-deeps (6), The Pits of Angband (8)
(1st) Orcs — 4 strikes with 8 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Ruins & Lairs [R].
Any Drake may be played keyed to this site
Eithel Morgoth (0), Ancient Maze (6), The Iron-deeps (5), The Pits of Angband (7)
(1st) Orcs — 4 strikes with 8 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic- attack 1 non- unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Ruins & Lairs [R].
Any Drake may be played keyed to this site. Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment.

card.name: The Wargs Wield the Goblins
card.text: Playable during CvCC, if all characters in the company control a wolf ally and no other non-flying allies are in the company. The attack by this company cannot be cancelled. If the company is attacked, you may assign all strikes (regardless of your character’s status). Alternatively, this card may be played during the movement hazard phase if all characters in the company control a wolf ally: cancel a non-unique non-flying attack against the company.

attr.value: Contains a hoard. *Only playable if the company has either faced an attack keyed to this site, or discards (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card it controls.
(1st) Traps — 2 strikes with 10 prowess(2nd) Opponent may play Elven Wards as a second automatic-attack (which affects the site).
(1st) Undead — 3 strikes with 9 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non- unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Coastal Sea [c].

Hidden site. Unless moving with starter movement, the company must discard a Belegaer to move to this site. Contains a hoard. The hazard player may play any number of Dragon's Curse from discard pile on characters leaving the site.
(1st) Undead — 3 strikes with 9 prowess;(2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack 1 non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Coastel Sea [c].

Hidden site. An overt company must tap 2 untapped character (if available) if this site is revealed as its new site. Contains a hoard. Hazard player may play any Dragon's Curse from hand (not counting against the hazard limit) on any characters entering the site.

card.name: Torogcrist
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Axe. Two-handed. Playable at any Under-deeps Dark-hold [D]. Warrior only: +3 to prowess (to a maximum of 10; against a Troll strike: +5 to prowess to a maximum of 12 and -2 to strike’s body). tap: allow bearer to face a strike from a Troll attack another character in his company is facing. Bearer makes a CC.

card.name: True Spirits of the North Winds
card.graphics: True Spirits of the North Winds.jpg
card.text: Unique. Maia. 3 strikes. Attacker chooses defending characters. Detainment against a hero and covert companies. May be played keyed to any non-Shadow-land [s] (non- Wilderness [w] if Mordó is in play) region in the Northern Waste. May always be played on a company in the Northern Waste containing Eloeklo, Demon of the North Wind. May also be played as a resource at any time to cancel an attack by Eloeklo, Lindor’s Bane, or to cancel CvCC if Eloeklo, Demon of the North Wind. is in the attacking company.

card.name: Uldor the Accursed
card.text: Unique. Undead. May be played at Himring.1 strike. If Doors of Night is in play, may be played keyed to any non-Haven [H], non- Free-hold [F] site in East Bay of Forochel, Elven Shores, Gondalf, Lindon, Minheldolath, Narthalf or West Bay of Forochel. Weapons do not modify prowess against this attack (unless Elven Blade is played on the weapon).

card.name: Umli Traders
card.text: Unique. Playable at Puolimisten Satama or Vasaran Ahjo if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Dwarves (+1), Elves (-1), Men (+1), Umli (+3). This faction is worth 2 mp if placed under Profitable Trade. May also be played as a minion resource by a covert company.

attr.value: A ranger at this site may tap to searchyour playdeck (shuffle) or discard pile for Skis and Fur-coats and place it with his company.
Men — 4 srikes with 7 prowess (detainment against covert companies)

card.name: Urdrak
card.text: Unique. Ice-orc. Discard on a body check of 8. +2 EI against Ice-orcs. Tap to modify the mind of an Orc at the same site by +1 or -1 this turn.

card.name: Vanha
card.text: Unique. Spirit-namer. +2 EI against Men andUmli factions and characters playable in the Northern Waste. Healing Song may be played on Vanha as if on an Elf. tap: during the organization phase, if no other characters are in her company, to prevent any hazard creature being played on her keyed to a region in the Northern Waste.

attr.value: Any Border-hold in the Northern Waste
Umli Traders faction is playable at this site.
Umli — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess (detainment against covert company)
Umli Traders faction is playable at this site.

card.name: Vision Path
card.text: Ritual. Playable during the organization phase on an Elf at the same site as the Keeper of the Lodge Elf. taTapp the Elf. All attempts to return target character to your hand are cancelled. +1 to his CC. If this card is untapped, the Elf cannot make any influence, riddling, offering or flattery attempts. taInvert this card during the site phase at a site where Information is playable. Dark enchantments cannot be played on the bearer. Cannot be duplicated on a given Elf.

card.name: War-wargs
card.text: Wolves. 2 strikes. As a creature, playable keyed to any Ruins & Lairs [R] with a Wolf automatic-attack. As a long-event, all Wolf attacks with body have their body modified by +1; and all Wolf attacks with no body have 4 body.

card.name: War-wolves
card.text: Wolves. 2 strikes. As a creature, playable keyed to any Ruins & Lairs [R] with a Wolf automatic-attack or any Shadow-hold [S] with an Orc automatic-attack. As a short-event, +2 to the prowess of an Orc creature attack keyed to a region by type or name.

card.name: Warrior-priests of Angmar
card.text: Unique. Playable at Litash and only by The Witch-king or The Angulion if the influence check is greater than 9.Standard Modifications: none tap: cancel a non-unique Man, Orc, or Troll creature attack without an asterix (*) keyed by name or type to Angmar or its adjacent regions against one of your companies.

card.name: Were-wolf
card.text: Demon. Wolf. 1 strike. May also be played at a Ruins & Lairs [R] that has at least 3 Wildernesses [w] in its site path. Any body check resulting from the attack is modified by +1, if the character is not bearing any armor, shield or helmet. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

card.name: Where the Wargs Howl
card.text: Playable on a company that has faced a Wolf attack this turn; does not count against the hazard limit. For the rest of the turn, any Orc hazard creature may be played on the company regardless of its site path or site.

card.name: White Vision
card.text: Disease. Playable on a character moving in the Northern Waste, if Doors of Night is not in play. A non-overt character with a home site in the Nothern Waste may tap to cancel this card before it resolves. Target character loses one of his skills (defender’s choice; choose the skill when this card resolves). Additionally, for every Snow-blindness played on target character, he looses another skill and the company may move one less region (to a minimum of two) Discard this card during any organization phase while target character is at a Haven [H] or at a site not in the Northern Waste. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: White Wolves
card.text: Wolves. 4 strikes. May be played keyed to any non-Coastal Sea [c] region in the Northern Waste. Additionally, White Wolves may be played keyed to a region away from the Northern Waste equally distant to the number of copies of Fell Winter, Long Winter and Snowstorm in play.

card.name: Wind-horde
card.text: Unique. Playable at an untapped site in the Northern Waste, if the company plays a Conjure the Tempest with a result for Demon Standard Modifications: Eloekklo, Demon of the North Wind is in the company (-3 to the roll for Conjure the Tempest). Any influence attempt against this faction must be done as if playing the faction from hand. tap: at any time to prevent Fell Winter from being discarded from play. Wind-horde does not untap normally; discard Conjure the Tempest from hand to untap this faction.

card.name: Wolf-steed
card.text: Wolf. Playable by an Orc at a Shadow-hold [S] or protected Wizardhaven [H]. Also playable at tapped sites if a Wolf-ally is present there. tap: cancel a strike from a non-automatic-attack against the bearer or itself. If the company consists of only Orcs and wolf allies, and each character controls a wolf ally, then all characters receive +1 prowess and the company may move 2 additional regions (to a maximum of 6).

card.name: Wose Shamanist Amulet
card.text: Playable only on a company containing a Wose character, or after successful play of a Wose faction or rune item. You may place a defeated non-asterix (*) Animal, Spider or Wolf creature with this item. tap: cancel an attack from the corresponding creature type. Only one creature may be placed with this item.
